name: washout-builder
description: Demo application for WashoutBuilder: https://github.com/bogdanRada/washout_builder HTML Generation Documentation for Soap Services. Check it out here: http://washout-builder.herokuapp.com/

scripts.postdeploy: bundle exec rake db:create && bundle exec rake db:migrate && bundle exec rake db:seed && bundle exec rake db:test:prepare

DATABASE_URL.description: The url to the database used in Heroku, which contains the credentials for db access. This should never be committed into repository

LANG.description: The language used by the application (Default: en_US.UTF-8)

RACK_ENV.description: The old (deprecated) environment variable used by Sinatra to set the environment - kept here for compatibility with other gems

RAILS_ENV.description: The environment variable used by Rails to set the environment (instead of RACK_ENV)

RAILS_SERVE_STATIC_FILES.description: Should be enabled only if static files should be served by Rails (Default: true)

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: The secret token used by Rails to generate the CSRF tags. This should never be committed into repository

scripts.test-setup: gem install rubocop && gem install reek
